page.title: 20ROYAL VISIT,ISLES OF SCILLY
page.content: On June 9th 1985 we went to the main island of St.Marys to see Her Majesty the Queen Mother.The boat trip over was very rough so we tried to keep dry in the cabin.We saw her go into the Town Hall where the Councillors were introduced by the Chairman of the Council,Mr Roy Duncan.Later Mr.Duncan introduced her to the seven children in our school abd we gave her our posies.After she had seen all the school children Her Majesty the Queen Mother went into the old peoples home,a band was playing outside.After that we went down to St.Marys quay and waited for the Queen Mother to board the launch which took her back to the Royal Yacht Britannia.When she had left the quay we got onto the Black Swan,and the boatman took us out to see the Britannia,on out trip home to St.Martins.
